name: com.abertay.analytics
description:
This package obfuscates some of the additional functionality of Unity Analytics and GameAnalytics and provides wrapper functions that allow the developer to send JSON data to a local file at the same time as Unity Analytics and/or GameAnalytics.

To make this work you will also need to install GameAnalytics from the following link:

https://drive.google.com/file/d/1evR-AKeqjRE_9-amH88ab8wB4e46xpEb/view?usp=share_link 

To install, simply download the .unitypackage at the link above and double click it while your project is open.
	Please note: This is a custom package of GameAnalytics set up to work correctly with AbertayAnalytics. Don't just download the latest  version from the GameAnalytics website.
